Package trees.layout

Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • trees.layout.Node
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Node>
    public class Node
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<Node>
    Helper class for wrapping a tree into an internal structure which contains all the displaying information.
    Author:
    Marcus Deininger

      • isDuplicate

        public boolean isDuplicate()
        Checks if the wrapped node is a duplicate - i.e. already contained in the tree. Actually this means, the structure is not really a tree.
        Returns:
        true, if the node is already displayed.

      • isPlaceHolder

        public boolean isPlaceHolder()
        Checks if the node is a placeholder for generating space.
        Returns:
        true, if the node is a placeholder object.

      • getTreeArea

        public java.awt.Rectangle getTreeArea​(Style style)
        Calculates the rectangle which is taken by the tree with respect to the style. By default this rectangle starts top left at (0|0). An offset is added later.
        Parameters:
        style - - The style for this tree.
        Returns:
        - The rectangle covered by this tree.

        protected int getSize()

        The size of the node.
